message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go below $135. This item is in high demand, and I'm confident it's worth this price.
I understand that the product is in high demand, but I'm still not comfortable paying $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
